data.name: Armored Front: Tiger Command
data.detailed_description:
Armored Front: Tiger Command is a fully interactive and immersive World War 2 VR Tank Game. You will command a Legendary Tiger 1 and lead your way to victory through the treacherous deserts of North Africa.

Early Access Features

  • Game takes place in the treacherous landscape of North Africa giving an open landscape better suited for tank combat
  • Driver Crew Station: Interactively drive the tank
  • Gunner Crew Station: Manually (with touch controller) operate the mighty 88 guns
  • Loader Crew Station: Play as the loader and manually load/unload the gun with different types of shells
  • Those who do not want to get their hands too dirty can also enable a simple loading system where the game will assist in the loading process
  • Commander Crew Station: Give basic commands to AI tank crew, call-in support
  • Call in Stuka close air support, and artillery strikes
  • AI tank crew and ability to give basic commands
  • Field repair mode: perform basic repairs, rearm, give the crew a break, etc.
  • Create custom levels using the in-game Level Editor (it will be basic at first but evolve with the game)
  • Skirmish gameplay mode

Planned Features

Career Mode featuring Grand Strategy, Open World Campaign, Advance AI, and Tank Upgrades are planned.

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in a fully interactive VR Tank game and lead your way across the treacherous deserts of North Africa in the Legendary Tiger Tank of World War 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains mature content not appropriate for all ages or everyone. Content may include blood, violence, gore and exploding tanks.
